metadata.name: portal
metadata.description: bridge program that interacts with bridge adapters

accounts.name: order_book_global
docs: Only order_book can send fill reports

accounts.name: order_book_global
docs: Only order_book can send fill reports

types.name: BridgePath
docs: Represents an allowed bridging path from a source token to a destination token

fields.name: source_mint
docs: Extension mint on Solana (e.g., wM mint pubkey)

fields.name: destination_token
docs: Token address on destination chain (e.g., Ethereum wM address)

types.name: ChainBridgePaths
docs: Per-destination-chain configuration of allowed bridging paths

fields.name: m_index
docs: The lastest index value to propagate to other chains

fields.name: message_nonce
docs: To ensure bridge message ID uniqueness

fields.name: isolated_hub_chain_id
docs: This portal is an isolated spoke

fields.name: unclaimed_m_balance
docs: Aggregate principal amount of M tokens stored when destination_token is not whitelisted
